name: A Glass Of Coffee
description:
A game by Monochrome Rhombus

With art by @cyb3ria_

Adventure through a strange world and escape the puzzling rooms within, at any means necessary.

Drink coffee from glasses, drink water from mugs, and make friends along the way in this strange game made in a very short time period.

And for those willing to search for them, a few secrets are hidden.

Playthrough length: 10-20 minutes
